channel.title: Complier Error Useing Morparscape
channel.description:
Getting a error javac not rec error here is the complier that came with the server pack.
[code]@echo off title Compiling Scripts cd Scripts javac -cp .;./../../MoparScape.jar; *.java pause[/code]
I assume javac needs to be java?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 22, 2009, 11:18:40 am[/size][hr]Fixed never mined I found "the perfect complier" seems to work though not sure what a complier is for I assume it updates your scripts.
